query: computer science 2020 sigchi karola marky 3d auth two factor authentication with personalized 3d printed items
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON pa.paper_id = p.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a ON a.author_id = pa.author_id
WHERE
    -- Year and venue
    p.year = 2020
    AND p.venue ILIKE '%sigchi%'
    
    -- Author name
    AND a.name ILIKE '%karola%marky%'  -- if stored as "Karola Marky"
        OR (
            p.year = 2020
            AND p.venue ILIKE '%sigchi%'
            AND (
                a.name ILIKE '%karola%' OR a.name ILIKE '%marky%'
            )
        )
    
    -- Title/abstract keywords
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%3d%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%3d%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%auth%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%auth%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%authentication%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%authentication%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%two factor%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%two factor%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%2fa%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%2fa%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%printed%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%printed%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%print%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%print%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC

query: acl yujia qin erica improving entity and relation understanding for pre trained language models via contrastive learning computer science 2020
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Title / topic keywords (ACL, improving entity and relation understanding,
    -- pre-trained language models, contrastive learning)
    (
        p.title ILIKE '%improving entity and relation understanding%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%entity and relation understanding%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%contrastive learning%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%pre-trained language model%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%pretrained language model%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%language models%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%ACL%'
    )
    -- Author name hints (Yujia Qin, Erica ...)
    OR (
        a.name ILIKE '%yujia qin%' OR
        a.name ILIKE '%qin, yujia%' OR
        a.name ILIKE '%erica%'
    )
    -- Venue / field / year hints
    OR (
        (p.venue ILIKE '%ACL%' OR p.venue ILIKE '%Association for Computational Linguistics%')
        AND p.year = 2020
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC
LIMIT 50

query: s surya unsupervised neural text simplification 2018 acl computer science
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers AS p
JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Author name (e.g., "S Surya")
    a.name ILIKE '%surya%'
    AND a.name ILIKE 's %'

    -- Title / abstract keywords
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%unsupervised%'
        AND p.title ILIKE '%neural%'
        AND p.title ILIKE '%simplification%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%unsupervised%'
           AND p.abstract ILIKE '%neural%'
           AND p.abstract ILIKE '%simplification%'
    )

    -- Year filter
    AND p.year = 2018

    -- Venue / field hints (ACL / computer science)
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%acl%'      -- ACL, ACL 2018, ACL conference, etc.
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%computational linguistics%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%nlp%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%computer science%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    pa.author_position ASC

query: 2016 contextual autonomy support in video game play a grounded theory computer science chi conference sebastian deterding
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a       ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Year filter
    p.year = 2016
    AND
    -- Title/abstract keyword filters (contextual autonomy support in video game play, grounded theory)
    (
        p.title ILIKE '%contextual autonomy support%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%contextual autonomy support%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%video game%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%video game%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%grounded theory%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%grounded theory%'
    )
    AND
    -- Venue: CHI conference (allow variants)
    (
        p.venue ILIKE '%CHI%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%Human-Computer Interaction%'
    )
    AND
    -- Author filter: Sebastian Deterding
    a.name ILIKE '%Sebastian%Deterding%'
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    pa.author_position ASC

query: political science e fritsch 2018 calling for a revolution an analysis of iot manifestos acm sigchi conference on human factors in computing systems
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.publication_date,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    p.open_access_status,
    p.open_access_license
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Title / topic keywords
    (
        p.title ILIKE '%calling for a revolution%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%analysis of iot manifestos%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%iot manifesto%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%iot manifesto%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%internet of things manifesto%'
    )
    -- Venue / field hints
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%ACM SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%CHI%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%ACM%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%political science%'
    )
    -- Author hint
    AND (
        a.name ILIKE '%fritsch%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%fritsch%'
    )
    -- Year hint
    AND p.year = 2018
ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST, p.year DESC
LIMIT 50

query: computer science 2020 sigchi novice ai music co creation via ai steering tools for deep generative models ryan louie
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a       ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Year / field / venue hints
    p.year = 2020
    AND p.venue ILIKE '%sigchi%'
    -- Title / abstract keyword hints
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%novice%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%ai%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%music%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%co-creation%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%co creation%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%steering%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%deep generative%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%novice%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%ai%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%music%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%co-creation%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%co creation%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%steering%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%deep generative%'
    )
    -- Author hint
    AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM PaperAuthors pa2
        JOIN Authors a2 ON pa2.author_id = a2.author_id
        WHERE pa2.paper_id = p.paper_id
          AND a2.name ILIKE '%ryan%louie%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    p.title ASC

query: effectiveness of conflict management strategies in peer review process of online collaboration projects computer science computer supported cooperative work wenjian huang 2016
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a       ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Author filter (Wenjian Huang)
    a.name ILIKE '%wenjian%huang%'
    
    -- Year filter (2016)
    AND p.year = 2016
    
    -- Topical / title / abstract relevance
    AND (
        -- core topic: conflict management in peer review
        (p.title ILIKE '%conflict%'      OR p.abstract ILIKE '%conflict%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%review%'    OR p.abstract ILIKE '%review%')
        
        -- collaboration / CSCW / online projects
        OR  p.title ILIKE '%online collaboration%'
        OR  p.abstract ILIKE '%online collaboration%'
        OR  p.title ILIKE '%computer supported cooperative work%'
        OR  p.abstract ILIKE '%computer supported cooperative work%'
        OR  p.title ILIKE '%CSCW%'
        OR  p.abstract ILIKE '%CSCW%'
        
        -- broader peer review / collaboration context
        OR (p.title ILIKE '%peer review%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%peer review%')
        OR (p.title ILIKE '%collaborative%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%collaborative%')
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC

query: computer science emnlp junsheng zhou 2016 amr parsing with an incremental joint model
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    array_agg(a.name ORDER BY pa.author_position) AS authors
FROM Papers AS p
JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE p.year = 2016
  AND p.venue ILIKE '%EMNLP%'
  AND a.name ILIKE '%Junsheng Zhou%'
  AND p.title ILIKE '%amr%'
  AND p.title ILIKE '%incremental%'
  AND p.title ILIKE '%joint%'
GROUP BY
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST

sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.publication_date,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a       ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match title/abstract to key phrases (case-insensitive)
    (
        p.title ILIKE '%datahop%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%datahop%' OR
        (p.title ILIKE '%spatial data%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%spatial data%') OR
        (p.title ILIKE '%virtual reality%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%virtual reality%')
    )
    -- Venue / field hints
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%uist%' OR
        p.venue ILIKE '%user interface%' OR
        p.venue ILIKE '%human-computer interaction%' OR
        p.venue ILIKE '%computer science%'
        OR p.venue IS NULL
    )
    -- Year hint
    AND p.year = 2020
    -- Author name hints (if present)
    AND (
        a.name ILIKE '%devamardeep%' OR
        a.name ILIKE '%hayatpur%' OR
        a.name ILIKE '%devamardeep hayatpur%'
        OR a.name IS NULL
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    pa.author_position ASC

query: mind the context the impact of contextualization in neural module networks for grounding visual referring expressions arjun reddy akula 2021 emnlp conference computer science
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a       ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match title keywords (case-insensitive)
    p.title ILIKE '%mind the context%'
    OR p.title ILIKE '%impact of contextualization%'
    OR p.title ILIKE '%neural module networks%'
    OR p.title ILIKE '%grounding visual referring expressions%'
    -- Match author name
    OR a.name ILIKE '%arjun reddy akula%'
    -- Match venue/year/contextual hints
    OR (p.venue ILIKE '%emnlp%' AND p.year = 2021)
    OR (p.venue ILIKE '%conference%' AND p.year = 2021)
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    p.title ASC

query: emnlp conference computer science 2018 bill yuchen lin neural adaptation layers for cross domain named entity recognition
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Venue / conference
    (p.venue ILIKE '%emnlp%' OR p.venue ILIKE '%empirical methods in natural language processing%')
    -- Year
    AND p.year = 2018
    -- Author
    AND a.name ILIKE '%bill yuchen lin%'
    -- Title / abstract keywords
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%neural adaptation layers for cross domain named entity recognition%'
        OR (
            p.title ILIKE '%neural%'
            AND p.title ILIKE '%adaptation%'
            AND p.title ILIKE '%layer%'
            AND p.title ILIKE '%cross%'
            AND p.title ILIKE '%domain%'
            AND (p.title ILIKE '%named entity%' OR p.title ILIKE '%ner%')
        )
        OR (
            p.abstract ILIKE '%neural%'
            AND p.abstract ILIKE '%adaptation%'
            AND p.abstract ILIKE '%cross%'
            AND p.abstract ILIKE '%domain%'
            AND (p.abstract ILIKE '%named entity%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%ner%')
        )
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    pa.author_position ASC

query: computer science 2021 emnlp conference efficient sampling of dependency structure ran zmigrod
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    array_agg(a.name ORDER BY pa.author_position) AS authors
FROM Papers AS p
JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Year filter
    p.year = 2021
    -- Venue filter (EMNLP conference)
    AND p.venue ILIKE '%emnlp%'
    -- Author filter (Ran Zmigrod)
    AND a.name ILIKE '%ran%zmigrod%'
    -- Title/abstract keyword filters (efficient sampling / dependency structure / CS-ish)
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%efficient sampling%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%dependency structure%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%efficient sampling%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%dependency structure%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%computer science%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%computer science%'
    )
GROUP BY
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC

query: 2021 adapting high resource nmt models to translate low resource related languages without parallel data wei jen ko computer science acl conference
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a       ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Year filter
    p.year = 2021
    AND
    -- Venue likely ACL conference
    (p.venue ILIKE '%ACL%' OR p.venue ILIKE '%Association for Computational Linguistics%')
    AND
    -- Title/abstract keywords about adapting high-resource NMT to low-resource related languages
    (
        (p.title ILIKE '%adapt%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%adapt%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%high resource%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%high resource%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%low resource%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%low resource%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%neural machine translation%' OR p.title ILIKE '%NMT%' 
             OR p.abstract ILIKE '%neural machine translation%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%NMT%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%parallel data%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%parallel data%')
    )
    AND
    -- Author name approximate match: "Wei Jen Ko"
    a.name ILIKE '%wei%ko%'
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    pa.author_position ASC

    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.publication_date,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    p.open_access_status,
    p.open_access_license
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match author name (Valtteri Wikström)
    a.name ILIKE '%valtteri%' AND a.name ILIKE '%wikstrom%'
    -- Match title keywords (Synchromouse: A Game of Improvised Joint Action)
    AND p.title ILIKE '%synchromouse%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%game%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%improvised%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%joint action%'
    -- Match year
    AND p.year = 2019
    -- Match venue / field hints (CSCW Companion, Computer Science)
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%cscw%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%companion%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%computer science%'
    )
ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST

query: coding for outdoor play a coding platform for children to invent and enhance outdoor play experiences sigchi computer science 2019 netta ofer
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a       ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match key title/abstract terms
    (
        (p.title ILIKE '%coding for outdoor play%' OR
         p.abstract ILIKE '%coding for outdoor play%')
        OR
        (p.title ILIKE '%coding%' AND
         p.title ILIKE '%outdoor%' AND
         p.title ILIKE '%play%')
        OR
        (p.abstract ILIKE '%coding%' AND
         p.abstract ILIKE '%outdoor%' AND
         p.abstract ILIKE '%play%')
    )
    -- Likely venue (SIGCHI / CHI)
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%sigchi%' OR
        p.venue ILIKE '%chi%'    OR
        p.venue ILIKE '%conference on human factors in computing systems%'
        OR p.venue IS NULL       -- allow missing venue
    )
    -- Year filter from query
    AND p.year = 2019
    -- Author name from query
    AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM PaperAuthors pa2
        JOIN Authors a2 ON pa2.author_id = a2.author_id
        WHERE pa2.paper_id = p.paper_id
          AND a2.name ILIKE '%netta%'  -- partial to allow "Netta Ofer"
    )
ORDER BY
    -- Prefer more exact title matches, then citations
    (CASE
        WHEN p.title ILIKE '%coding for outdoor play%' THEN 0
        ELSE 1
     END),
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    pa.author_position ASC

query: deep neural model inspection and comparison via functional neuron pathways james fiacco 2019 acl conference computer science
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match title keywords (case-insensitive)
    p.title ILIKE '%deep%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%neural%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%model%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%inspection%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%comparison%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%functional%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%neuron%'
    AND p.title ILIKE '%pathways%'
    -- Match author name
    AND a.name ILIKE '%james%fiacco%'
    -- Match year
    AND p.year = 2019
    -- Match venue keywords (ACL conference, computer science)
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%acl%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%association for computational linguistics%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    pa.author_position ASC

query: e mitchell emnlp computer science 2022 enhancing self consistency and performance of pre trained language models through natural language inference
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers AS p
JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Author name match (e.g., "E Mitchell")
    a.name ILIKE '%mitchell%'
    AND a.name ILIKE 'e %'

    -- Venue / field hint: EMNLP / computer science
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%emnlp%' OR
        p.venue ILIKE '%empirical methods in natural language processing%' OR
        p.venue ILIKE '%computational linguistics%' OR
        p.venue ILIKE '%computer science%'
    )

    -- Year constraint
    AND p.year = 2022

    -- Title / abstract keywords from the query
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%enhancing%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%self-consisten%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%self consisten%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%pre-trained language model%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%pre trained language model%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%natural language inference%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%enhancing%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%self-consisten%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%self consisten%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%pre-trained language model%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%pre trained language model%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%natural language inference%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC,
    pa.author_position ASC

query: extend extractive entity disambiguation 2022 computer science acl annual meeting edoardo barba
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON pa.paper_id = p.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a ON a.author_id = pa.author_id
WHERE
    -- match key title/abstract terms (extend extractive entity disambiguation)
    (
        (p.title ILIKE '%extend%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%extend%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%extractive%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%extractive%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%entity%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%entity%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%disambiguation%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%disambiguation%')
    )
    -- restrict to 2022
    AND p.year = 2022
    -- venue: ACL Annual Meeting (allow some variation)
    AND p.venue ILIKE '%acl%'
    AND p.venue ILIKE '%annual%'
    -- author: Edoardo Barba
    AND a.name ILIKE '%edoardo%barba%'
ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST, p.year DESC

query: emnlp conference improving complex knowledge base question answering via question to action and question to question alignment 2022 yechun tang computer science
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors a       ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Venue / conference
    (p.venue ILIKE '%emnlp%')

    -- Title keywords (allow partial / fuzzy matching)
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%improving%'
        AND p.title ILIKE '%complex%'
        AND p.title ILIKE '%knowledge base%'
        AND p.title ILIKE '%question answering%'
    )

    -- Year
    AND p.year = 2022

    -- Author name (if present in DB)
    AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM PaperAuthors pa2
        JOIN Authors a2 ON pa2.author_id = a2.author_id
        WHERE pa2.paper_id = p.paper_id
          AND a2.name ILIKE '%yechun tang%'
    )

ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST, p.year DESC

query: vania mendoncca 2021 computer science online learning meets machine translation evaluation finding the best systems with the least human effort acl conference
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers p
JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON pa.paper_id = p.paper_id
JOIN Authors a ON a.author_id = pa.author_id
WHERE
    -- Author name (allowing for minor spelling variants)
    a.name ILIKE '%vania%' 
    AND a.name ILIKE '%mendon%'  -- matches "Mendonça", "Mendonca", etc.

    -- Year
    AND p.year = 2021

    -- Venue (ACL conference)
    AND p.venue ILIKE '%acl%'

    -- Title / abstract keywords
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%online learning%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%online learning%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%machine translation%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%machine translation%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%evaluation%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%evaluation%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%best systems%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%best systems%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%human effort%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%human effort%'
    )
ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST

query: upvotes downvotes no votes understanding the relationship between reaction mechanisms and political discourse on reddit orestis papakyriakopoulos 2023 computer science chi conference
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.publication_date,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    p.open_access_status,
    p.open_access_license
FROM Papers AS p
JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa
    ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
JOIN Authors AS a
    ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match author
    a.name ILIKE '%orestis papakyriakopoulos%'
    -- Match year
    AND p.year = 2023
    -- Match venue (CHI conference, allow variants)
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%CHI%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%ACM CHI%'
    )
    -- Match title keywords (flexible, in case of slight variations)
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%upvotes%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%downvotes%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%no votes%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%reaction mechanisms%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%political discourse%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%reddit%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC

LEFT JOIN Authors a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    p.year = 2020
    AND p.venue ILIKE '%ACL%'              -- ACL conference
    AND (
        -- title/abstract keywords
        p.title ILIKE '%language agnostic%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%language-agnostic%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%bert%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%sentence embedding%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%sentence-embedding%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%language agnostic%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%language-agnostic%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%bert%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%sentence embedding%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%sentence-embedding%'
    )
    AND (
        -- author name variants
        a.name ILIKE '%fangxiaoyu%' OR
        a.name ILIKE '%feng%'
    )
ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST, p.title
LIMIT 50

query: a globerson acl 2016 computer science collective entity resolution with multi focal attention
sql:

    a.name ILIKE '%globerson%'

    OR p.title ILIKE '%entity resolution%'

    OR p.title ILIKE '%attention%'
    OR p.abstract ILIKE '%attention%'
